comments: A sweetheart of a man and wants you to do well. He\'ll leave most of the work up to you, if you really want to learn the stuff you will have to read it on your own. His lectures are fun but don\'t go by the book much. His tests are easy. Very nice guy and is willing to help if you ask for it.

Take this class online if you can. You barely have to do any work whatsoever. Didn\'t learn jack but aced this class no problem. His tests only cover one small, simply topic from his lectures. VERY SIMPLE take it for easy A now!

He did not teach me a single thing. I went into this class wanting to learn. I am completely disappointed. I paid good money and he showed up for class 10 minutes everyday and left. It was pure laziness but no one complains because its THE EASIEST A in the whole world. Dont take him if you want to learn anything about Excel, Word, or Access
He made class fun and enjoyable! He was a very easy teacher and interesting man.

He is a great professor and I wish I had him for all of my classes. He makes the class fun and gets to the point. Very easy to talk to and has a great teaching style. If you can take him for any class do it for sure. Two thumbs up!
He is super easy. And extremely helpful! He won\'t keep you in class if he has nothing more to teach you that day, he\'s a great teacher.
Awesome......Absolutely Awesome....take him if you can, great professor. Nice, helpful, fun, great attitude and teaching style...worth the time!
One of the greatest teachers on campus by far. Really easy and makes the class enjoyable. You seriously have to TRY and fail his courses. Take him if you can!

Charles is extremly nice.. make sure you take him if you want an "A".. he is funny and very interesting.. attendance isn\'t required, but just remember that the class still goes on without you. You can\'t fail in his class.. in the word of charles, "You have to really sweat it to fail my course."
